xMatixSense.title: xMatix Sense
xMatixSense.description1: Embed intelligence directly into workflows to anticipate issues, guide decisions, and act within governed boundaries.
xMatixSense.description2: xMatix Sense is the agentic intelligence layer of the xMatix platform. It continuously observes execution signals across systems, predicts risks and opportunities, and recommends or triggers actions within live operational workflows.

whatIsIt.title: What it is
whatIsIt.description2:
xMatix Sense brings intelligence directly into the flow of work. 
 Unlike traditional analytics or copilots that surface insights in dashboards or chats, Sense operates inside execution workflows. It monitors events, context, and outcomes in real time, enabling systems to anticipate issues and guide actions as work happens. 
 Sense does not replace human judgment. It augments it with timely, policy-bound intelligence that improves execution speed and consistency.

coreCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
coreCapabilities.description: These capabilities allow intelligence to participate directly in operational workflows across domains.

coreCapabilitiesCard1.title: Policy Enforcement
coreCapabilitiesCard1.content: Ensure business rules, approvals, and controls are consistently enforced across all workflows.

coreCapabilitiesCard2.title: Audit & Compliance
coreCapabilitiesCard2.content: Maintain full traceability of execution, decisions, and changes for regulatory compliance.

coreCapabilitiesCard3.title: Omnichannel Execution
coreCapabilitiesCard3.content: Execute workflows seamlessly across web, mobile, and field operations.

coreCapabilitiesCard4.title: Configurable Automation
coreCapabilitiesCard4.content: Adapt workflows and logic quickly without redeploying rigid systems.

coreCapabilitiesCard5.title: Time-based Orchestration
coreCapabilitiesCard5.content: Trigger actions, SLAs, and escalations using real-time and scheduled events.

cardsData.title: Auto resolve stock shortages
cardsData.description: Detect inventory risks early and trigger replenishment or rerouting actions automatically.

cardsData.title: Predict SLA breaches
cardsData.description: Identify and recommend corrective actions before they occur to protect commitments.

cardsData.title: Optimize technician assignment
cardsData.description: Match skills, availability, and location to assign the right technician for each job.

cardsData.title: Detect payroll and incentive anomalies
cardsData.description: Flag payout errors, anomalies, or policy violations before payroll is finalized.

worksWith.title: Works With
worksWith.description: All xMatix modules run on the same execution platform.  Sales, Service, Warehouse, Inventory, Procurement, Finance, Payroll, People, and Partners share a common foundation for workflows, data context, & governance.
